body:
Hello everyone,


I have got Intel Q6600 Core 2 Quad CPU and realized that I need to get
all my cores working. So I have developed some shell scripts and I can
upload them for you if someone is interested. In fact they are the
multithreaded wrappers to rtrace and rpict.


The benchmarking results I've got is very promising. The CPU load was
about 99.8%!


Best regards,
Ilya
___
